00182 template <class T>
00183 class ItemsContainer {
00184     protected:
00185         CamulewebApp *m_webApp;
00186         std::list<T> m_items;
00187 
00188     
00189         void EraseAll()
00190         {
00191             m_items.erase(m_items.begin(), m_items.end());
00192         }
00193     public:
00194         ItemsContainer(CamulewebApp *webApp)
00195         {
00196             m_webApp = webApp;
00197         }
00198         virtual ~ItemsContainer() { }
00199         
00200 
00201         int ItemCount()
00202         {
00203             return m_items.size();
00204         }
00205         
00206         
00207         T *AddItem(T &item)
00208         {
00209             m_items.push_back(item);
00210             T *real_ptr = &(m_items.back());
00211             return real_ptr;
00212         }
00213 
00217         virtual bool ReQuery() = 0;
00218 
00219         typedef typename std::list<T>::iterator ItemIterator;
00220         ItemIterator GetBeginIterator()
00221         {
00222             return m_items.begin();
00223         }
00224         ItemIterator GetEndIterator()
00225         {
00226             return m_items.end();
00227         }
00228 };
00229 
00235 template <class T, class G, class I>
00236 class UpdatableItemsContainer : public ItemsContainer<T> {
00237     protected:
00238         // need duplicate list with a map, so check "do we already have"
00239         // will take O(log(n)) instead of O(n)
00240         // map will contain pointers to items in list 
00241         std::map<I, T *> m_items_hash;
00242     public:
00243         UpdatableItemsContainer(CamulewebApp *webApp) : ItemsContainer<T>(webApp)
00244         {
00245         }
00246         
00247         T *AddItem(T &item)
00248         {
00249             T *real_ptr = ItemsContainer<T>::AddItem(item);
00250             m_items_hash[item.ID()] = real_ptr;
00251             return real_ptr;
00252         }
00253     
00254         T *GetByID(I id)
00255         {
00256             // avoid creating nodes
00257             return m_items_hash.count(id) ? m_items_hash[id] : NULL;
00258         }
00259 
00260         T * GetByHash(const CMD4Hash &fileHash)
00261         {
00262             T * ret = 0;
00263             for (typename std::map<I, T *>::iterator it = m_items_hash.begin(); it != m_items_hash.end(); it++) {
00264                 if (it->second->nHash == fileHash) {
00265                     ret = it->second;
00266                     break;
00267                 }
00268             }
00269             return ret;
00270         }
00271 
00276         void ProcessUpdate(const CECPacket *reply, CECPacket *full_req, int req_type)
00277         {
00278             std::set<I> core_files;
00279             for (CECPacket::const_iterator it = reply->begin(); it != reply->end(); it++) {
00280                 G *tag = (G *) & *it;
00281         
00282                 core_files.insert(tag->ID());
00283                 if ( m_items_hash.count(tag->ID()) ) {
00284                     T *item = m_items_hash[tag->ID()];
00285                     item->ProcessUpdate(tag);
00286                 } else {
00287                     full_req->AddTag(CECTag(req_type, tag->ID()));
00288                 }
00289             }
00290             std::list<I> del_ids;
00291             for(typename std::list<T>::iterator j = this->m_items.begin(); j != this->m_items.end(); j++) {
00292                 if ( core_files.count(j->ID()) == 0 ) {
00293                     // item may contain data that need to be freed externally, before
00294                     // dtor is called and memory freed
00295                     
00296                     T *real_ptr = &*j;
00297                     this->ItemDeleted(real_ptr);
00298                     
00299                     del_ids.push_back(j->ID());
00300                 }
00301             }
00302             for(typename std::list<I>::iterator j = del_ids.begin(); j != del_ids.end(); j++) {
00303                 m_items_hash.erase(*j);
00304                 for(typename std::list<T>::iterator k = this->m_items.begin(); k != this->m_items.end(); k++) {
00305                     if ( *j == k->ID() ) {
00306                         this->m_items.erase(k);
00307                         break;
00308                     }
00309                 }
00310             }
00311         }
00312         
00313         void ProcessFull(const CECPacket *reply)
00314         {
00315             for (CECPacket::const_iterator it = reply->begin(); it != reply->end(); it++) {
00316                 G *tag = (G *) & *it;
00317                 // initialize item data from EC tag
00318                 T item(tag);
00319                 T *real_ptr = AddItem(item);
00320                 // initialize any external data that may depend on this item
00321                 this->ItemInserted(real_ptr);
00322             }
00323         }
00324         
00325         bool DoRequery(int cmd, int tag)
00326         {
00327             CECPacket req_sts(cmd, EC_DETAIL_UPDATE);
00328         
00329             //
00330             // Phase 1: request status
00331             const CECPacket *reply = this->m_webApp->SendRecvMsg_v2(&req_sts);
00332             if ( !reply ) {
00333                 return false;
00334             }
00335             
00336             //
00337             // Phase 2: update status, mark new files for subsequent query
00338             CECPacket req_full(cmd);
00339         
00340             ProcessUpdate(reply, &req_full, tag);
00341         
00342             delete reply;
00343         
00344             // Phase 3: request full info about files we don't have yet
00345             if ( req_full.HasChildTags() ) {
00346                 reply = this->m_webApp->SendRecvMsg_v2(&req_full);
00347                 if ( !reply ) {
00348                     return false;
00349                 }
00350                 ProcessFull(reply); 
00351                 delete reply;
00352             }
00353             return true;
00354         }
00355         
00356         virtual void ItemDeleted(T *) { }
00357         virtual void ItemInserted(T *) { }
00358 };

00562 };

00701         
00702         CImageLib m_ImageLib;
00703 
00704         virtual void ProcessURL(ThreadData) = 0;
00705         virtual void ProcessImgFileReq(ThreadData) = 0;
00706 
00707         int GzipCompress(Bytef *dest, uLongf *destLen,
00708             const Bytef *source, uLong sourceLen, int level);
00709             
00710         friend class CWebSocket;
00711         friend class CPhPLibContext;
00712     
00713         bool m_upnpEnabled;
00714         int m_upnpTCPPort;
00715 #ifdef ENABLE_UPNP

00723     public:

00726

00736         //
00737         // Command interface
00738         //
00739         void Send_ReloadSharedFile_Cmd();
